text:
[Verse]
Woke up to a sky of gray
Dreams are calling out to play
Can't shake this feeling inside
Time to take a wild ride

[Verse 2]
Walking down the lonely streets
Echoes of our heartbeats
Every step's a silent tune
Dancing to the cloudy moon

[Chorus]
Cloudy daydreams in the air
Every worry
Every care
Gonna chase 'em all away
In this cloudy grand ballet

[Verse 3]
Fluffy clouds
They guide the way
Through this dreamy
Hazy day
Lost in thoughts that drift and sway
Finding peace in shades of gray

[Bridge]
Eyes wide open
Still we dream
Life's not always what it seems
Through the mist
We find our theme
In these cloudy day ole schemes

[Chorus]
Cloudy daydreams in the air
Every worry
Every care
Gonna chase 'em all away
In this cloudy grand ballet
title: Cloudy Daydreams
